name: mowen-chrome-extension
description: 墨问笔记助手 Chrome 扩展 - 智能整理网页内容并发布到墨问笔记

scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run package
scripts.validate: node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('manifest.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ manifest.json 格式正确')"
scripts.check: node -e "console.log('🔍 检查核心文件...'); const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['manifest.json', 'background.js', 'content.js', 'popup.html', 'popup.js', 'popup.css', 'options.html', 'options.js', 'sidepanel.html', 'sidepanel.js', 'icons/icon16.png', 'icons/icon48.png', 'icons/icon128.png']; const missing = files.filter(f => !fs.existsSync(f)); if (missing.length) { console.error('❌ 缺少文件:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ 所有核心文件存在'); }"

author: 墨问笔记助手团队
